attributes.action: encourage rugby league clubs to use paper banners for the team entrances that promote local businesses and sponsors more frequently
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We ask the PM to call on Rugby League Clubs to voluntarily sign up to
use more paper banners  and paper burstsfor the team to break through for on pitch entrances and for the banners to be VAT Exempt to encourage their use more often.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
